scripts.postinstall: npm run getBinDep && npm run getScriptgenDep
scripts.getBinDep: wget -q https://static.mathworks-ci.com/run-matlab-command/v0/run-matlab-command.zip -O bin.zip; unzip -qod bin bin.zip; rm bin.zip
scripts.getScriptgenDep: wget -q https://static.mathworks-ci.com/matlab-script-generator/v0/matlab-script-generator.zip -O scriptgen.zip; unzip -qod scriptgen scriptgen.zip; rm scriptgen.zip
